law.catch_line: Resale Of Mattress, Box Spring, Studio Couch Or Futon Mattress; Notice To Consumer
law.text: Notwithstanding any general or special law or rule or regulation to the contrary, a mattress, box spring, studio couch or futon mattress which has been delivered to and used by a customer and which is later returned to the seller thereof shall be clearly and conspicuously marked thereon and advertised by the seller before any further sale with a tag stating the following: “This mattress, box spring, studio couch or futon mattress has been previously sold, delivered, used and returned and is being offered for resale.”
